tool_description: Turn text into your favorite character's speaking voice.
name: Deep Fake Text To Speech with 3900+ Voices
title: Deep Fake Text To Speech with 3900+ Voices
tool_name: Deep Fake Text To Speech with 3900+ Voices

api_list.name: Fetch Speech - API 3
api_list.description: Here pass the id you get by calling generate speech from text api.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://deep-fake-text-to-speech-with-3900-voices.p.rapidapi.com/v1/model_inference/job_status/jinf_3jh98ss0cs7paz8dmvfp1ta6r79"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "deep-fake-text-to-speech-with-3900-voices.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://deep-fake-text-to-speech-with-3900-voices.p.rapidapi.com/v1/model_inference/job_status/{inference_job_token}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "deep-fake-text-to-speech-with-3900-voices.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Models/Voices List- API 1
api_list.description:
Use this api to fetch all the voices or models 
use the model_token in the next api to create task for generating voice.
api_list.code:

url = "https://deep-fake-text-to-speech-with-3900-voices.p.rapidapi.com/tts/list"
